resources.string: Whoops - the app has crashed. Sending a report to the developer.
Please enter the URL for the application configuration file.
Please enter the password required to configure this launcher.
Unable to automatically set configuration from the web. Please verify that the configuration file is valid and reachable from the public Internet.
Unable to automatically set configuration from the web while the password is set.
This is an intentionally long string created to see if the widget will truncate the title.

This is an intentionally long string created to see if the widget will truncate the message. Rinse and repeat: This is an intentionally long string created to see if the widget will truncate the message.
